tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Disrespect towards elderly. He addressed my mother with a singular tone not even giving respect to her age. He used a harsh tone in asking my mother some things which she couldn't understand at once due to her age induced slight hearing disability. **** *** ********** ******** ****** *** ****** ********* *** * ***** **** ********* **** ****** ********* ** ******** *** ****** ** *********** ** **** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor diagnosed the problem very well and was guided in the right direction. An apt test was prescribed and medicines do not include any anti-biotics.
Diagnosing the issue in very few minutes and friendly nature and give the proper treatment
Good experience and response if doctor is also good main thing is there is no waiting to meet the doctor
